T02D3332:24b-1: a'arya aa ba lo ki ta shva ra sya shata aaksha ra s'a dha nam /
T02D3332:24b-3: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yi ge drug pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02D3332:24b-4: 'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3332:25a-1: re zhig sngags pas bde ba'i gdan la 'dug ste /
T02D3332:25a-2: kha dag pa la sogs pa byas nas sangs rgyas
T02D3332:25a-3: la sogs pa bltas te yang dag par mchod nas
T02D3332:25a-4: / gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba byas nas /
T02D3332:25a-5: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi //
T02D3332:25a-6: zhes bya ba la sogs pa bya'o//
T02D3332:25a-7: ji srid sems can thams cad kyi grangs su gtogs pa /
T02D3332:25a-16: yod min med min gyi 'du shes la sogs pa
T02D3332:25a-17: ji srid sems can gyi khams su gtogs pa brjod
T02D3332:25a-18: pa de thams cad bdag gis phung po lhag ma
T02D3332:25a-19: med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su gzhag
T02D3332:25a-20: par bya'o // de nas aom sva bh'a wa shuddha:sarba
T02D3332:25a-21: dharm'a:sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham zhes bya ba lan gsum
T02D3332:25a-22: par bya'o // brjod la / yud tsam gyis stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3332:25a-23: de nas rang gi snying gar padma dkar po'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D3332:25a-25: de las 'od zer brgya stong phrag mang po byung bar bsams la /
T02D3332:25a-26: sems can thams cad kyis thog ma med pa'i dus
T02D3332:25a-27: nas bsags pa'i 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs
T02D3332:25a-28: pa'i tshogs khams gsum du gtogs pa dag par byas
T02D3332:25a-29: nas / yi ge de nyid rang gi snying gar bcug pas /
T02D3332:25a-30: de yongs su gyur pa las bdag nyid 'jig rten
T02D3332:25a-31: dbang phyug gi gzugs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa
T02D3332:25a-37: phyi ma'i phyag gnyis kyis snying gar thal mo sbyar zhing 'dzin pa /
T02D3332:25a-38: 'od dpag tu med pa'i ral pa'i dbu rgyan can no //
T02D3332:25a-39: g-yas phyogs su nor bu 'dzin pa /
T02D3332:25a-40: de dang 'dra ba'i mdog dang phyag dang mtshan ma can te /
T02D3332:25a-41: phyi ma'i phyag gis thal mo sbyar ba'o //
T02D3332:25a-42: g-yon phyogs su yi ge drug pa'i rig pa 'jig
T02D3332:25a-43: rten dbang phyug dang 'dra ba'i sku mdog dang phyag
T02D3332:25a-45: de nas aom mah'a su kha badzra satva dza:h'um bam ho:/
T02D3332:25a-46: su ra ta stvam aa la la la ho /
T02D3332:25a-47: aa:aa:aa:aa:zhes bya ba'i byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags brjod par bya'o //
T02D3332:25b-0: @25b de ltar bsgoms nas 'jig rten mgon po'i thugs
T02D3332:25b-1: kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la phreng ba'i rnam pa
T02D3332:25b-2: lta bu'i dkar po zhal nas byung ste /
T02D3332:25b-3: lte bar 'jug cing 'khor lo 'khor ba'i sbyor bas
T02D3332:25b-4: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po yid bzhin gyi
T02D3332:25b-5: nor bu rtog pa sngags kyi rgyal po 'di bzlas
T02D3332:25b-6: par bya'o // de nas 'khor zhing 'dug pa la sogs pa thob nas /
T02D3332:25b-7: dad pa dang snying rje dang ldan pa bla ma
T02D3332:25b-8: la gus pa'i rnal 'byor pas dus mi ring bar
T02D3332:25b-10: aom ma ni padme h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3332:25b-11: de nas ldang ba'i dus su sngags 'di brjod de gnas par bya'o //
T02D3332:25b-12: aom badzra satva sa ma ya ma nu p'a la ya /
T02D3332:25b-13: badzra satva tve no pa tishtha dri dho me bha ba /
T02D3332:25b-14: su to shyo me bha ba /
T02D3332:25b-15: su po shyo me bha ba /
T02D3332:25b-16: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
T02D3332:25b-17: sarba siddhimme pra yatstsha sarba karma su tsa me tsittam shre ya:ku ru h'um /
T02D3332:25b-18: ha ha ha ha ho:bha ga b'an sarba ta th'a
T02D3332:25b-19: ga ta badzra m'a me munytsa badzri bha ba ma
T02D3332:25b-20: h'a sa ma ya satva a'a:zhes brjod la ji ltar
T02D3332:25b-22: yi ge drug pa'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3332:25b-23: dpal lhan cig skyes pa'i rol pas mdzad pa rdzogs so //
T02D3332:25b-24: pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang /
